rooms.description: A spacious entrance with wheelchair-accessible paths, incorporating Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and polished surfaces.
An open-plan area merging the living room and dining space, featuring a grand chandelier and art deco finishes. Wheelchair accessibility ensured via wide doorways and smooth transitions.
A luxurious master bedroom with Art Deco accents like chrome fixtures and elegant geometric patterns, complete with an en-suite bathroom and wheelchair-accessible facilities.

Two guest bedrooms that maintain symmetry and incorporate Vastu principles with the placement of windows and doors to maximize natural light. Wheelchair accessibility ensured through design modifications as needed.
A modern kitchen with Art Deco style cabinetry, integrated with functional layout per local building norms, including wheelchair-accessible counters and pathways.
Private living space for the servants that adheres to Vastu guidelines ensuring auspicious placement, with basic facilities integrated in a respectful layout.

openings.description: A wide, wheelchair-accessible door ensuring ease of entry and adherence to accessibility standards.
Large windows installed for optimal natural light in line with Vastu principles and Art Deco aesthetics.
A dedicated garage access door designed to facilitate smooth entry for two cars while ensuring seamless transition into the penthouse area.

rooms.description: An opulent suite that spans a significant portion of the penthouse, featuring Art Deco design elements such as intricate moldings and polished finishes. Equipped with wheelchair-accessible features.
A dedicated space for work or study, designed with functional lighting and ergonomic furnishings meeting both Art Deco style and accessibility requirements.

openings.description: A door leading to an expansive balcony that provides a vantage view of the swimming pool and surrounding landscape.
Strategically placed windows in line with Vastu principles for balanced energy flow and natural light enhancement.

rooms.description: A serene swimming pool area integrated with Art Deco design elements, featuring a tiled deck and ambient lighting, ensuring that the space is wheelchair accessible.

openings.description: A gently sloping access ramp leading to the swimming pool area, designed for easy navigation and wheelchair accessibility.
A main access door providing entry into the roof-top area from the penthouse.
Dual large garage doors designed to accommodate two cars, integrated with smooth transitions for wheelchair accessibility and adherence to local norms.
